name: Blue Moon Bakery
description: A local family-owned bakery serving fresh artisan bread, pastries, and coffee since 1995. Known for our sourdough and croissants.

name: TechStyle Electronics
description: Your one-stop shop for the latest electronics, gadgets, and accessories. Expert staff ready to help with all your tech needs.

name: Sunset Yoga Studio
description: Transform your mind and body with our expert-led yoga classes. All levels welcome, from beginners to advanced practitioners.

name: The Coffee Corner
description: Cozy neighborhood coffee shop with premium single-origin beans, homemade pastries, and free WiFi. Perfect for remote work or catching up with friends.

name: Urban Threads Boutique
description: Curated selection of contemporary fashion and accessories. Sustainable brands, unique pieces, and personalized styling services available.

name: Green Thumb Landscaping
description: Professional landscaping and lawn care services. From design to maintenance, we create beautiful outdoor spaces that last.

name: Spice Market Restaurant
description: Authentic Indian cuisine with a modern twist. Family recipes passed down through generations, using fresh spices and locally-sourced ingredients.

name: Book Nook
description: Independent bookstore specializing in literary fiction, local authors, and rare finds. Monthly book clubs and author events.

name: AutoCare Pro
description: Full-service auto repair and maintenance. ASE-certified technicians, honest pricing, and shuttle service available.

name: Pizzeria Bella
description: Traditional wood-fired pizza made with imported Italian ingredients. Dine-in, takeout, and delivery available.

name: Fit Zone Gym
description: State-of-the-art fitness facility with personal training, group classes, and 24/7 access. First week free for new members!

name: Home & Garden Supply
description: Everything for your home and garden needs. Hardware, tools, plants, and expert advice. Local family business since 1978.
